flawed_nl_solution:
Lisa had 20 - 5 = <<20-5=18>>18 marbles.
Since Cindy gave 12 marbles, then she only has 20 - 12 = <<20-12=8>>8 marbles left.
Since Lisa received 12 marbles, then Lisa has 18 + 12 = 30 marbles now.
Hence, Lisa has 30 - 8 = <<30-8=22>>22 marbles more than Cindy.
#### 22

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 18. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
